item.title: Ceasar_salad
item.description: INGREDIENTS: 6 cloves garlic 3 anchovy filets Salt to taste 2 egg yolks Juice of 1.5 large lemons 1 heaping Tbsp (18g) dijon 1.25 cup 300ml vegetable oil 3/4 cup grated parmigiano Pepper to taste Garlic bread Croutons Leaves INSTRUCTIONS: Method: Start by smashing the garlic cloves, sprinkle with kosher salt, and finely chop using the rolling chop method. Chop, gather, chop, gather, and occasionally smear with a knife. Continue this process for 3-5 minutes.
